from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    if not triples:
        return ""

    # Group triples by subject to build more coherent sentences
    subject_groups = {}
    for triple in triples:
        subject = triple.subject
        if subject not in subject_groups:
            subject_groups[subject] = []
        subject_groups[subject].append(triple)

    sentences = []
    for subject, triples_list in subject_groups.items():
        # Sort triples to prioritize certain predicates for natural flow
        sorted_triples = sorted(triples_list, key=lambda t: [
            "birthDate", "birthPlace", "birthYear", "deathDate", "deathPlace",
            "nationality", "origin", "background", "occupation", "professionalField",
            "genre", "instrument", "recordLabel", "associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist",
            "activeYearsStartYear", "activeYearsEndYear", "capital", "country",
            "isPartOf", "location", "governingBody", "leader", "leaderTitle",
            "currency", "anthem", "demonym", "language", "officialLanguage",
            "areaTotal", "populationDensity", "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel",
            "postalCode", "foundingDate", "training", "meaning", "longName",
            "parentCompany", "distributingCompany", "derivative", "musicSubgenre",
            "musicFusionGenre", "stylisticOrigin", "alternativeName", "bandMember"
        ].index(t.predicate) if t.predicate in [
            "birthDate", "birthPlace", "birthYear", "deathDate", "deathPlace",
            "nationality", "origin", "background", "occupation", "professionalField",
            "genre", "instrument", "recordLabel", "associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist",
            "activeYearsStartYear", "activeYearsEndYear", "capital", "country",
            "isPartOf", "location", "governingBody", "leader", "leaderTitle",
            "currency", "anthem", "demonym", "language", "officialLanguage",
            "areaTotal", "populationDensity", "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel",
            "postalCode", "foundingDate", "training", "meaning", "longName",
            "parentCompany", "distributingCompany", "derivative", "musicSubgenre",
            "musicFusionGenre", "stylisticOrigin", "alternativeName", "bandMember"
        ] else 999)

        # Build a single sentence per subject using natural conjunctions
        parts = []
        for triple in sorted_triples:
            predicate = triple.predicate
            object_ = triple.object

            if predicate == "associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist":
                parts.append(f"associated with {object_}")
            elif predicate == "background":
                parts.append(f"with a background as a {object_}")
            elif predicate == "birthDate":
                parts.append(f"born on {object_}")
            elif predicate == "genre":
                parts.append(f"performing {object_} music")

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
